Coffee.name: Espresso
Coffee.description: Smooth and versatile Espresso Roast. Espresso has more caffeine per unit volume than most beverages.

Coffee.name: Cappuccino
Coffee.description: With less milk than a latte, cappuccino offers a stronger espresso flavor and a luxurious texture

Coffee.description: This is the original coffeehouse classic.

Coffee.name: Brewed Coffee Black
Coffee.description: The clean, nutty taste of a good Colombia.

Coffee.name: Hot Chocolate
Coffee.description: Sweet, creamy comfort in a cup. Made with steamed milk.
